body:
Variables are named in a consistent way(lowercase letters + underscores). Good job!

-------------------------------------------------

**Conventional naming rules**

[Constants](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/#constants):
Uppercase letters + underscores
e.g. INIT_X

Class:
First character is an uppercase letter.
e.g. Car

Local(global) variables:
Lowercase letters + underscores.
e.g. car_type
The code meets the requirements of PEP8 :star2:
